name: Durr Bugger
description:
Durr Burger Fortnite Arcade Mini Game. This is the game that appears in the season 9 trailer.  This is a fan made game not an official one. But it was made as close as possible to the one that appears in the trailer.  

Disclaimer: This is a fan made game, I don't own the graphics, music or title name.
This is not a commercial release by Sparckman, but if you wish you contribute to my work you can do so. This project was  created in 16 hours using Gdevelop.

Check out my Youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/user/amazingsparckman
